name: Sync Interactive
description:
At Sync Interactive, we specialise in maximising the potential of mobile technology. From B2B, B2C, marketing, internal productivity, user engagement and maximising your sales, there is no better, more engaging and effective marketing platform than that of mobile. We are here to help your business take advantage of this.
Voted the UK's Best Mobile Agency 2015 (under 40 staff category) in the RAR+ 2015 Digital Awards, our expertise, client feedback and passion and dedication in the industry allows us to work with you to create groundbreaking solutions.
READ MORE...
